about_the_game:
BLOODPUNISHED is a horror platformer where you attempt to escape a mysterious place with very little room for error.

Told through hand-drawn sketches in his diary, you take on the role of a victim documenting his descent into madness.

The game aims to combine horror with a platforming challenge that involves interacting with the environment to progress further and uncover more of this place’s mystery.

content_descriptors.notes: Some drawings may depict hanged people, and there are occasions where torture is shown.
